Name: Odallus: The Dark Call
About the game: The old gods have forgotten this land. No one could save our people when darkness started spreading and collecting human souls for its army. Odallus is a classic exploration/action game, inspired by Ghosts’n Goblins, Demon’s Crest and Castlevania. Player takes place of Haggis, a warrior tired of fight who must wield his sword once more to rescue his son from Darkness. Original Sound Track: Features Eight levels open to exploration Huge bosses Sharp controls Rad 8-bit graphics Thrilling atmosphere 8+ hours of gameplay 50+ types of enemies Veteran Mode
